short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can be used to skip/block sony liv ads in NON live videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This browser extension is designed to skip or block ads in non-live videos on Sony LIV. Once installed, it automatically detects ad segments in on-demand content and either skips them entirely or blocks them, providing an uninterrupted viewing experience. The extension seamlessly integrates with the browser, working in the background without requiring manual intervention. Users can enjoy their favorite shows and movies without the distraction of advertisements. It's particularly useful for binge-watching sessions, ensuring that the content flows smoothly.
